ygData.subject: Where do we go from here?
ygData.msgSnippet: Where do we go from here? One minor detail needs to be attended to, and thats finding this third book, just for the sake of completely wrapping up this
ygData.messageBody:
Where do we go from here?


One minor detail needs to be attended to, and thats finding this third
book, just for the sake of completely wrapping up this mystery, and putting
everything to rest. According to latest rumors its in Steamfont somewhere...

Then secondly I think all the gnomes from this one-list, and those who post
on eq.stratics.com and anyone else who was ever interested in this mystery
should pick a server, and get together in Akanon and have a good ole
fashion drunken fishing festival!

Complete with high diving at the great wheel, and lots of just general
"Gnoming about".

Rotgut
